caption.title: wMel reduces midgut CHIKV infection in Singaporeâ€™s Ae. aegypti.
caption.p: Midgut CHIKV titre in WT and wMel-Sg Ae. aegypti at days 6, 9 and 13 post-infections. CHIKV levels in midguts were determined using qRT-PCR assay and expressed as Log10 RNA copies/ml. Bars denote median viral titres. *** denotes significant difference at P<0.05 by Mann-Whitney test. Each point represents an individual midgut.
